description:
The mission of PiplCoin is to provide high grade liquidity for a blockchain based project called PiplShare. PiplShare is a blockchain based job-board ecosystem, where employers and candidates can realize their potential. Every single user profile is unique and exposed to constant estimation-validation process.
Transactions between PiplShare users are supported with PiplCoin, dedicated deflationary cryptocurrency with a high tendency to growth.
name: PiplCoin
